bug_report.Bug_Name: Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new user
bug_report.Description: Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new the user, hence unable to create a new user in the application
bug_report.Steps_to_Reproduce: Navigate to the Users Menu -> New User
Filled out all the user information fields
Seen an error page “ORA1090 Exception: Insert values Err
See the attached logs for more information (Attach more logs related to the bug..IF any)
Also see the attached screenshot of the error page
bug_report.Expected_Result: On clicking the SAVE button, you should be prompted to a successful message “New User has been created successfully”
